updates.title: Groundbreaking Ceremony
updates.description: We officially broke ground on our new church building! The entire congregation gathered to celebrate this historic moment. The site has been cleared and prepared for construction.

updates.title: Foundation Work Begins
updates.description: Excavation and foundation work has commenced. The team is working diligently to ensure a solid foundation for our new home.

updates.title: Foundation Complete
updates.description: The concrete foundation has been fully poured and cured. All inspections passed successfully. We're ready to move to the next phase!
